languages.text: {n}Пластина в руках друкари с обратной стороны снабжена двумя тонкими крючьями. Они не выглядят как обычные крепления для доспехов, вдобавок оба покрыты чем-то влажно блестящим.{/n}
{n}The underside of the plate is fitted with two thin hooks. They do not look like normal armour fastenings, and they are also coated in something wetly glistening.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пластина в руках друкари с обратной стороны снабжена двумя тонкими крючьями. Они не выглядят как обычные крепления для доспехов, вдобавок оба покрыты чем-то влажно блестящим.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The underside of the plate is fitted with two thin hooks. They do not look like normal armour fastenings, and they are also coated in something wetly glistening.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The underside of the plate is fitted with two thin hooks. They do not look like normal armour fastenings, and they are also coated in something wetly glistening.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}护甲板底部装着两个细小的钩子，看起来并不像是普通的护甲扣件，上面的涂层散发着液体般的亮光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The underside of the plate is fitted with two thin hooks. They do not look like normal armour fastenings, and they are also coated in something wetly glistening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}护甲板底部装着两个细小的钩子，看起来并不像是普通的护甲扣件，上面的涂层散发着液体般的亮光。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}プレートの下側​​には細いフックがふたつ付いている。見た目は普通の防具の留め具と違っており、さらにテラテラと濡れた何かで覆われていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The underside of the plate is fitted with two thin hooks. They do not look like normal armour fastenings, and they are also coated in something wetly glistening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}プレートの下側​​には細いフックがふたつ付いている。見た目は普通の防具の留め具と違っており、さらにテラテラと濡れた何かで覆われていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La parte interna de la placa tiene dos finos ganchos. No parecen las típicas sujeciones de una armadura, y también están manchadas de algo húmedo y reluciente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The underside of the plate is fitted with two thin hooks. They do not look like normal armour fastenings, and they are also coated in something wetly glistening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La parte interna de la placa tiene dos finos ganchos. No parecen las típicas sujeciones de una armadura, y también están manchadas de algo húmedo y reluciente.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La face cachée de la plaque est munie de deux crochets aussi fins qu'acérés. Différents des attaches équipant habituellement les armures, ils sont également enduits d'une sorte de fluide luisant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The underside of the plate is fitted with two thin hooks. They do not look like normal armour fastenings, and they are also coated in something wetly glistening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La face cachée de la plaque est munie de deux crochets aussi fins qu'acérés. Différents des attaches équipant habituellement les armures, ils sont également enduits d'une sorte de fluide luisant.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Auf der Unterseite der Platte befinden sich zwei dünne Haken. Sie wirken nicht wie gewöhnliche Rüstungshaken und sind zudem mit etwas feucht Glänzendem bedeckt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The underside of the plate is fitted with two thin hooks. They do not look like normal armour fastenings, and they are also coated in something wetly glistening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf der Unterseite der Platte befinden sich zwei dünne Haken. Sie wirken nicht wie gewöhnliche Rüstungshaken und sind zudem mit etwas feucht Glänzendem bedeckt.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Plakanın alt tarafı, ikiz kancalarla donatılmış. Normal zırh bağlarına benzememelerinin yanı sıra nemle parıldayan bir şeyle kaplanmışlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The underside of the plate is fitted with two thin hooks. They do not look like normal armour fastenings, and they are also coated in something wetly glistening.{/n}
